replies.body: Would you rather live half your life in extreme sadness and half of your life in extreme happiness (Sadness and happiness happen in intervals. So it's not like the first 30 years of your life you're sad and the last 30 you're happy, it's more like 1 day you're really sad and the next you're really happy), or never feel happy nor sad?
replies.body_tagged: Would you rather live half your life in extreme sadness and half of your life in extreme happiness (Sadness and happiness happen in intervals. So it's not like the first 30 years of your life you're sad and the last 30 you're happy, it's more like 1 day you're really sad and the next you're really happy), or never feel happy nor sad?

replies.body: I would rather be sad half and happy half then lose it.
replies.body_tagged: I would rather be sad half and happy half then lose it.
